data.introduce: 本接口实现了BOP支付的功能。
data.business:
BOP支付（黑屏指令-DPAY：密码）
BOP取消支付（黑屏指令-DPAY：R）
BOP外航本票支付（黑屏指令-DPAY：BP）
data.functions: 该接口可用于实现BOP支付、BOP取消支付、BOP外航本票支付功能。
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"crsPnrLocator","type":"string","quantity":"","description":"pnr","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"issueAllowedOffice","type":"string","quantity":"","description":"允许支付的office","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"password","type":"string","quantity":"","description":"密码","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"paymentActionCode","type":"string","quantity":"","description":"操作类型：Pay-支付，cancelPay-取消支付， bpPay-德付通外航本票支付","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"eotType","type":"string","quantity":"","description":"封口类型","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"office","type":"string","quantity":"","description":"office号","children":[],"default":""}]
data.responseSchema: [{"name":"airDPayRs","type":"object","quantity":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"code","type":"string","quantity":"","description":"错误码","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"crsPnrLocator","type":"string","quantity":"","description":"pnr","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"msg","type":"string","quantity":"","description":"错误英文描述","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"msgZH","type":"string","quantity":"","description":"错误中文描述","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"name","type":"string","quantity":"","description":"错误名称","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"trace","type":"string","quantity":"","description":"错误描述信息","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""}]
data.errorCodes: [{"code":" 403 ","name":null,"msg":null,"msgZh":" 用户名、密码、IP错误或无权限 "},{"code":" -303 ","name":null,"msg":" inner service error ","msgZh":" 内部服务异常 "},{"code":" -304 ","name":null,"msg":" sending commands too fast, try again later ","msgZh":" 访问速度过快,请稍后再试 "},{"code":" -305 ","name":null,"msg":" transaction times limited ","msgZh":" 访问次数限制 "},{"code":" -301 ","name":null,"msg":" office permission denied ","msgZh":" Office 没有权限 "},{"code":" -390 ","name":null,"msg":" IBE Service Error ","msgZh":" IBE服务异常 "},{"code":" -311 ","name":null,"msg":" time out, please try again later ","msgZh":" 操作超时，请稍后再试 "},{"code":" -306 ","name":null,"msg":" too many concurrent request for service ","msgZh":" 访问频率限制 "},{"code":" -1 ","name":null,"msg":" Biz Error ","msgZh":" 业务异常 "},{"code":" -402 ","name":null,"msg":" Input error! ","msgZh":" 输入参数出错 "}]
